fullplot: When police funding is cut, the Governor announces he must close one of the academies. To make it fair, the two police academies must compete against each other to stay in operation. Mauser persuades two officers in Lassard's academy to better his odds, but things don't quite turn out as expected...
plot: The alumni of Commandant Lassard's Police Academy (1984) return to the school to train new recruits and prevent its closure.
title: Police Academy 3: Back in Training
